page.title: 13Botany Bay Farm
page.content: The{Teale}family have been farming in this area since 1939.Mr. Bill Teale has been farming all his life and sons Joe and Peter and grandson David all work the farm together.The farm covers {110 acres}and is mainly under{barley and wheat.They also grow{potatoes,oats {sugar beet}and{clover}for stock feeding.They have some permanent grass for grazing{25 cattle}(Herefords and Limousin) and{70 ewes}and lambs.The biggest changes in Bill's lifetime has been the{mechanisation}of farming. There are no longer any jobs to do with crops that are done by hand.The old farm buildings are disappearing and being replaced by larger pre-fabricated buildings to house the large machinery now needed in farming.Fields are becoming larger and{hedgerows disappearing.
